description: This file defines a Zustand store for managing shopping cart state in an e-commerce frontend application. It includes state variables, methods to modify and synchronize the cart with server API calls, and persistence configuration.

methods.name: setFromServer
methods.description: Updates the cart state with data fetched from the server.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches the latest cart data from the server and updates the store.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a product to the cart and refreshes the cart state.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates the quantity of a specific cart item and refreshes the cart.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a product from the cart and refreshes the cart.

methods.name: apply
methods.description: Applies a coupon code to the cart and refreshes the cart.
